Class Properties

java.lang.Object
com.calcgame.main.buttons.Properties
public class Properties extends Object
The properties of a button in a ButtonCollection

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ButtonCollection
    collection
    The collection to which the button belongs
    @Nullable org.python.core.PyComplex
    count
    The number of clicks remaining (or null if the button is in the shop)
    org.python.core.PyDictionary
    data
    Other (mainly modded) data about the button
    boolean
    infinity
    Whether the button can be clicked infinitely
    ButtonCollection.Coordinate
    pos
    The position of the button in the collection
    @Nullable org.python.core.PyComplex
    price
    The price of the button (or null if it is not in the shop)
    Button
    rendered_button
    The rendered button object (or null if it has not been rendered yet)
    Label
    rendered_count
    The rendered count label object (or null if it has not been rendered yet)
    Label
    rendered_price
    The rendered price label object (or null if it has not been rendered yet)
    boolean
    sold
    Whether the button has been sold and should not be rendered
    int
    x
    The coordinates where the button is rendered (in px)
    int
    y
    The coordinates where the button is rendered (in px)
